name: Spalien
description:
Spalien is a game about an Alien called Spalien that wonders in space around Earth and ends up being shot down by Humans and the Ship is completely destroyed but Spalien is alive and the Humans are coming for him, Can you manage to break into NASA and hijack a rocket playing as an Alien using only a Spoon?!

This Game was made in 24 Hours and is a Submission to the Over Night Itch.io Game Jam
